item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/04/14/webhooks-on-wordpress-com/#comment-3407">Mikael</a>.
You may need to debug on the plugin side then.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mikael.

You may need to debug on the plugin side then.

item.title: By: Mikael
item.dc:creator: Mikael
item.description:
Hi
I been trying on my third-party( stand alone site) for a day now to apply the hookpress plugin, but I don't get any of the fields to be sent to the server side php script. I tried with the $_REQUEST['field_name'] and the same with $_POST the only thing that is sent is hook=edit_post none of the other things are sent to the server.
/Mikael
item.content:encoded:
Hi

I been trying on my third-party( stand alone site) for a day now to apply the hookpress plugin, but I don’t get any of the fields to be sent to the server side php script. I tried with the $_REQUEST[‘field_name’] and the same with $_POST the only thing that is sent is hook=edit_post none of the other things are sent to the server.

/Mikael
